attributes.additional_details: parents would save a lot of buying new clothes as there children will where there own clothes and wouldn’t have to spend so Much on clothing for school and those pupils could where them clothes on the weekends as well as school Saving a lot of money
attributes.background: Pupils should be able to show if there individuality as they go to school and feel a lot more confident in there own clothes and not in the same as everyone else also it gives the pupils a chance to be more creative with clothing
